channel.title: [PI] Server IP
channel.description: Hey guys I haven't been around private servers since the 314 days so I'm not familiar with the new servers' framework yet since everything you needed used to just be in client.java. Is there a post where someone explains where everything is located now and if not where can I set up the IP/Port that the server is going to run on? Thanks in advance.

item.title: [PI] Server IP
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Yeah Delta was in its infancy back then but it still focused on the client class. The clients themselves don’t seem to have changed that much so I was able to set it up to connect to my server and pack it into a .jar but I can’t find where to set the server’s ip/port within the actual server base. Any idea where it’s located now? Not a fan of the new packaging so far :L

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Server IP
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Not that I know of.

Everything is packaged, poorly, but packaged.

Delta/Allstarsources still use the client class heavily.

Read full topic
